<S%H176>Otherwise<s%> if I had <S%H6213>dealt<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%> against his <S%H5315>life<s%> (and there is no <S%H1697>matter<s%> <S%H3582>hidden<s%> from the <S%H4428>king<s%>), then you yourself would have set yourself against <S%H3320>me.<s%>"
